entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
